bear out the arrangement wh: prevails 
in the anterior two-thirds of the brain, namely,
that the corpus callosum is not an interhemis-
pherical commissure, but serves to connect 
the convolutions of one side with the basal 
ganglia of the opposite.
[The “optic expansion “ fibres, on the other hand, are a 
very complex system. They divide anteriorly into 
several bands wh: run to different parts. One set 
of fibres is the <u>direct sensitive band <\u> & enters the 
inner capsule of the <s>[text?]<\s> same side while <s>numbers <\s>
of others become associated with the geniculate 
bodies also of the same side. A detailed description 
of these at present however would be out of 
place.
